architectural_notes: Add authorization rules to prevent unauthenticated/other users from editing/deleting a user's movie collection (owner-only write access; guests read-only).
known_issues: Currently other site visitors can delete or modify the user's movies (missing/incorrect access control).

existing_features.title: Update the frontend to prevent guests/other users from attempting restricted actions: hide or disable the Delete action when the current identity is not the movie owner, and prevent opening/submitting the Add Movie dialog when the user is not authenticated.

new_feature_requests.summary: Restrict permissions so site visitors/guests cannot modify or delete the user's movies (access control/authorization)
Add backend authorization so only the movie creator (owner) can delete their movie, and unauthenticated (anonymous) callers cannot add or delete movies.
Expose movie ownership information to the frontend so the UI can determine whether the current user is allowed to delete a given movie.

projectName: Prevent guests and other visitors from modifying or deleting the owner's movies
